name: Build SSIS
description: Build SQL Server Integration Services Project into .ispac file using legacy Package Deployment Model
author: ToxicGlobe

inputs.name: solnCmdSwitch
inputs.label: Command line switch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the following command line switches to perform specific task. See: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/xee0c8y7.aspx

inputs.name: solnConfigName
inputs.label: Solution Configuration Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the solution configuration that will be used to build the solution named in Solution File. Default value is $(BuildConfiguration). See: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/xee0c8y7.aspx

inputs.name: buildProject
inputs.label: Add Project File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable to identify a single .dproj project file within the specified solution configuration. See: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/a4sf02ac.aspx

inputs.name: projConfigName
inputs.label: Project Configuration Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. The name of a Project build configuration to be used that will be used to build the solution named in Project File. Default value is $(BuildConfiguration). See: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/abtk353z.aspx

inputs.name: devenvVersion
inputs.label: Devenv Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select Denenv.com version. Appropiate version of SQL Data Tools must be installed on agent! See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/ssdt/download-sql-server-data-tools-ssdt
